debugCenters: Show center markers for debugging layout placement (default: false)

layout._title: Configure how images are arranged in the gallery

algorithm.type: The algorithm used to arrange images in the gallery (default: radial)

sizing._title: Control how image sizes are calculated

adaptive._title: Automatically adjust sizes based on container and image count
adaptive.minSize: Smallest allowed image size in pixels (default: 50)
adaptive.maxSize: Largest allowed image size in pixels (default: 400)

layout.targetCoverage: How much of the container area images should fill, 0.3-0.9 (default: 0.6)
layout.densityFactor: Multiplier affecting how tightly images are packed (default: 1.0)

spacing._title: Control spacing around and between images
spacing.padding: Space between images and container edges (default: 50)

grid.columns: Number of columns in the grid layout (default: auto)
grid.rows: Number of rows in the grid layout (default: auto)
grid.gap: Space between grid cells in pixels (default: 10)
grid.stagger: Offset every other row for a staggered pattern (default: none)
grid.jitter: Random offset applied to image positions (default: 0)
grid.overlap: How much images can overlap each other (default: 0)
grid.fillDirection: Order in which grid cells are filled (default: row)
grid.alignment: Alignment of images within their cells (default: center)
grid.overflowOffset: Offset for overflow images when count exceeds cells (default: 0.25)

spiral.spiralType: Mathematical curve used: golden, archimedean, logarithmic (default: golden)
spiral.direction: Clockwise or counter-clockwise spiral direction (default: counterclockwise)
spiral.tightness: How close spiral arms are to each other (default: 1.0)
spiral.scaleDecay: Images get smaller toward the outer spiral (default: 0)
spiral.startAngle: Rotation offset for the spiral pattern in degrees (default: 0)

cluster.clusterCount: Number of image clusters to create (default: auto)
cluster.clusterSpread: How far images spread within each cluster (default: 150)
cluster.overlap: How much images can overlap within clusters (default: 0.3)
cluster.density: Distribution of images within clusters (default: uniform)
cluster.distribution: Mathematical distribution for cluster placement (default: gaussian)

wave.amplitude: Height of the wave peaks and troughs (default: 100)
wave.frequency: Number of wave cycles across the container (default: 2)
wave.phaseShift: Offset between rows in the wave pattern (default: 0)
wave.synchronization: How wave phases align across rows (default: offset)

algorithm: The algorithm used to arrange images in the gallery (default: radial)

grid.columns: Number of columns in the grid layout (default: auto)
grid.rows: Number of rows in the grid layout (default: auto)
grid.gap: Space between grid cells in pixels (default: 10)
grid.stagger: Offset every other row for a staggered pattern (default: none)
grid.jitter: Random offset applied to image positions (default: 0)
grid.overlap: How much images can overlap each other (default: 0)
grid.fillDirection: Order in which grid cells are filled (default: row)
grid.alignment: Alignment of images within their cells (default: center)
grid.overflowOffset: Offset for overflow images when count exceeds cells (default: 0.25)

spiral.spiralType: Mathematical curve used: golden, archimedean, logarithmic (default: golden)
spiral.direction: Clockwise or counter-clockwise spiral direction (default: counterclockwise)
spiral.tightness: How close spiral arms are to each other (default: 1.0)
spiral.scaleDecay: Images get smaller toward the outer spiral (default: 0)
spiral.startAngle: Rotation offset for the spiral pattern in degrees (default: 0)

cluster.clusterCount: Number of image clusters to create (default: auto)
cluster.clusterSpread: How far images spread within each cluster (default: 150)
cluster.overlap: How much images can overlap within clusters (default: 0.3)
cluster.density: Distribution of images within clusters (default: uniform)
cluster.distribution: Mathematical distribution for cluster placement (default: gaussian)

wave.amplitude: Height of the wave peaks and troughs (default: 100)
wave.frequency: Number of wave cycles across the container (default: 2)
wave.phaseShift: Offset between rows in the wave pattern (default: 0)
wave.synchronization: How wave phases align across rows (default: offset)

adaptive._title: Automatically adjust sizes based on container and image count
adaptive.minSize: Smallest allowed image size in pixels (default: 50)
adaptive.maxSize: Largest allowed image size in pixels (default: 400)

spacing._title: Control spacing around and between images
spacing.padding: Space between images and container edges (default: 50)

sizing.baseHeight: Default height for images before variance

variance.min: Minimum size multiplier for random sizing (default: 1.0)
variance.max: Maximum size multiplier for random sizing (default: 1.0)

sizing.scaleDecay: Center images larger, outer images smaller (default: 0)

rotation.mode: How rotation is applied: none, random, tangent (default: none)

range.min: Minimum random rotation angle in degrees (default: -15)
range.max: Maximum random rotation angle in degrees (default: 15)

styling._title: Configure visual styling for images. Use the state selector to switch between Default, Hover, and Focused states. All properties are available for all states - hover and focused inherit from default when not explicitly set.

border._title: Image border settings (available for all states). Use side selector to configure All sides or individual Top, Right, Bottom, Left sides.
border.width: Thickness of image border in pixels (default: 0)
border.radius: Corner rounding of images in pixels. Use corner selector to configure All corners or individual UL, UR, BR, BL corners (default: 0)
border.style: Border line style: solid, dashed, dotted, double, none, groove, ridge, inset, outset, hidden (default: solid)

borderTop._title: Top border settings - overrides 'border' for the top side only
borderTop.width: Thickness of top border in pixels (inherits from border.width)
borderTop.color: Color of top border (inherits from border.color)
borderTop.style: Top border line style (inherits from border.style)

borderRight._title: Right border settings - overrides 'border' for the right side only
borderRight.width: Thickness of right border in pixels (inherits from border.width)
borderRight.color: Color of right border (inherits from border.color)
borderRight.style: Right border line style (inherits from border.style)

borderBottom._title: Bottom border settings - overrides 'border' for the bottom side only
borderBottom.width: Thickness of bottom border in pixels (inherits from border.width)
borderBottom.color: Color of bottom border (inherits from border.color)
borderBottom.style: Bottom border line style (inherits from border.style)

borderLeft._title: Left border settings - overrides 'border' for the left side only
borderLeft.width: Thickness of left border in pixels (inherits from border.width)
borderLeft.color: Color of left border (inherits from border.color)
borderLeft.style: Left border line style (inherits from border.style)

styling.borderRadiusTopLeft: Top-left corner radius in pixels - overrides border.radius for this corner (inherits from border.radius)
styling.borderRadiusTopRight: Top-right corner radius in pixels - overrides border.radius for this corner (inherits from border.radius)
styling.borderRadiusBottomRight: Bottom-right corner radius in pixels - overrides border.radius for this corner (inherits from border.radius)
styling.borderRadiusBottomLeft: Bottom-left corner radius in pixels - overrides border.radius for this corner (inherits from border.radius)
styling.shadow: Drop shadow preset: none, sm, md, lg, glow (default: none)

filter._title: CSS filter effects (available for all states)

hover._title: Appearance when mouse hovers over image. Inherits from default when not explicitly set.

focused._title: Appearance when image is clicked/focused. Inherits from default when not explicitly set.

default._title: Default appearance of images - base styling that hover and focused inherit from

hover._title: Appearance when mouse hovers over image. Inherits from default when not explicitly set.

focused._title: Appearance when image is clicked/focused. Inherits from default when not explicitly set.

animation.duration: How long animations take to complete in milliseconds (default: 600)

queue.interval: Delay between each image's animation start (default: 150)

start.position: Where images animate in from (default: nearest-edge)
start.offset: Distance from edge where animation begins (default: 100)

path.type: Animation trajectory: linear, bounce, elastic, wave (default: linear)
path.preset: Preset configuration for the selected path type

rotation.mode: How images rotate as they enter: none, spin, settle, random, wobble (default: none)
rotation.spinCount: Number of full rotations during spin animation (default: 1)
rotation.direction: Spin direction: clockwise, counterclockwise, auto, random (default: clockwise)
rotation.startRotation: Starting rotation range for settle mode in degrees (default: -45 to 45)

scale.mode: How images scale as they enter: none, grow, shrink, pop, random (default: none)
scale.startScale: Starting scale multiplier 0.1-4.0 for grow/shrink modes (default: 0.3 for grow, 1.5 for shrink)

pop.overshoot: How much to overshoot final scale, 1.05-1.5 (default: 1.2)

duration: How long animations take to complete in milliseconds (default: 600)

queue.interval: Delay between each image's animation start (default: 150)

start.position: Where images animate in from (default: nearest-edge)
start.offset: Distance from edge where animation begins (default: 100)

path.type: Animation trajectory: linear, bounce, elastic, wave (default: linear)
path.preset: Preset configuration for the selected path type

rotation.mode: How images rotate as they enter: none, spin, settle, random, wobble (default: none)
rotation.spinCount: Number of full rotations during spin animation (default: 1)
rotation.direction: Spin direction: clockwise, counterclockwise, auto, random (default: clockwise)
rotation.startRotation: Starting rotation range for settle mode in degrees (default: -45 to 45)

wobble.frequency: Number of wobble oscillations during animation (default: 3)

scale.mode: How images scale as they enter: none, grow, shrink, pop, random (default: none)
scale.startScale: Starting scale multiplier 0.1-4.0 for grow/shrink modes (default: 0.3 for grow, 1.5 for shrink)

pop.overshoot: How much to overshoot final scale, 1.05-1.5 (default: 1.2)

focus.scalePercent: Size of focused image relative to container (default: 0.8)
Size of focused image relative to container (default: 0.8)
